title: Untitled
text:
A new poll shows 20% of Americans want their state to join Canada, with support rising to 30% among adults under 35. The shift comes amid Trump’s trade war and threats to annex Canada using “economic force.”

Only 35% of Americans support Trump’s tariffs, while two-thirds worry about rising grocery prices. Pollsters say polarization and Trump’s stances on abortion and immigration are driving Americans to look north.

Leger VP Andrew Enns said some Americans “would likely relish the opportunity to join Canada.”

images.title: Blake, Wm. Enoch Walked with God. 1780.
